pages.text: Magic Magnets are items that can teleport items to the player at the expense of durability. $(br2)There are eight tiers of magnets; Stone, Iron, Redstone, Gold, Obsidian, Lapis, Diamond, and Emerald, each having a different level of durability and range.
Each tier has more durability and range than the prior. $(br2)By default, Magic Magnets use more durability than regular $(l:magnets/magnets)magnets$().
